reviews.customers_say: Customers find the cardigan comfortable with no itchy feeling against the skin, and appreciate its style as an adorable fall piece with a nice pattern.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I get so many compliments every time I wear it
items.body: Absolutely love the Sidefeel Women's Plaid Cardigan! The chunky knit is incredibly cozy and perfect for winter. The oversized fit is stylish and comfortable, making it easy to layer. The gray color is versatile and pairs well with anything. Quality is superb, and it feels durable. I get so many compliments every time I wear it. This cardigan exceeded my expectations and is worth every penny. Highly recommend for warmth, comfort, and style! Read more
items.author: Jorge MB

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Fall Staple
items.body: This sweater is just right for fall. It is a long sleeve, open-front sweater that has no buttons, making it easy to layer and toss on quickly. The style is oversized, and I would say the fit is generous without being baggy. The one I picked up is a light gray mixed with black, and the pattern is what really makes it stand out. It has a basket weave design through the main part of the sweater, while the cuffs shift to an arrow-style knit that adds some texture and contrast. The material feels soft but structured, not floppy or overly loose. It is thick enough to keep warm on a crisp day but not bulky, so you can wear it comfortably indoors or outdoors in the early part of the season. It looks well sewn and well constructed overall, and I really love the way it finishes an outfit without needing to fuss with buttons or closures. Read more
items.author: Sera

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Soft, warm and comfy
items.body: This item is soft and comfortable to wear. It was true to size out of the package. I am washing it now so hopefully it remains true. Read more
items.author: Tanya

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fashionable and warm
items.body: Lovely and appears to be made quite well. Read more
items.author: Katherine Silverstein

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Highly recommend Best price bought on sale
items.body: Oversized jacket/coat comfortable . Colors are great . Great for any Place any time , material is wrinkle resistance . Read more
items.author: Blessed

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Snags and tears easily
items.body: Super warm and cute but snags and tears easily Read more
items.author: Cara Cavender

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wonderful
items.body: Love Love Love. It is heavy and keeps you warm. Fits wonderfully and very versatile with jeans or work clothes. Soft and seems to be great quality. Read more
items.author: JomommaG

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Thick and Cozy
items.body: This is an open-front chunky knit cardigan in army green. The material feels thick and cozy and the oversized fit makes it super comfortable without looking sloppy. The checkered pattern adds a nice trendy touch without being too loud and the army green color is really flattering and easy to match with other pieces. The sleeves are long and roomy and the knit feels well-made and is not itchy. Read more
items.author: Rosa Reyes

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Gray, Apricot, Army Green, Hot Pink, Black, Dark Gray, Light Blue, Red, Mocha Brown, Pink, Deep Blue, Medium Gray, Charcoal. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
